characteristics.$text:
Your army can use 1 **^^Dirty Trick^^** ability per phase. The effect of a **^^Dirty Trick^^** ability is only applied if you make a successful dirty trick roll. The success of a dirty trick roll depends on the number of **^^Dirty Trick^^** abilities your army has already used this battle round:
**First:**  2+
**Second:** 3+
**Third:** 4+
**Fourth or subsequent:** 5+
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Infantry^^** unit to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Until the start of your next turn, the target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Dirty Trick^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with any friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. In addition, for the rest of the turn, the target’s weapons cannot be affected by the Charge (+1 Damage) weapon ability
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Dirty Trick^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Infantry^^** unit that has 10 or fewer models,  is not in combat and has not been the target of a **^^Dirty Trick^^** ability this turn to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Dirty Trick^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick an enemy unit in combat with any friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: The target has **^^Strike-last^^** for the rest of the turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Dirty Trick^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Your Shooting Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick up to 3 friendly **Man-skewer Boltboyz** or **Beast skewer Killbow** units to be the targets.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: For the rest of the turn, add 3" to the Range characteristic of the targets’ ranged weapons.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** unit wholly within 12" of them, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit
characteristics.name: Effect

rules.description:
**The following universal terrain abilities apply to this terrain feature (Terrain, 1.2):
Cover, Impassable**
rules.name: Skaregob Totem

characteristics.$text:
While this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss:
• The Shouty Boss cannot use **^^Move^^** abilities.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Shouty Boss, measure to this terrain feature instead.
• All attacks that would target the Shouty Boss target this terrain feature instead.
• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Shouty Boss. Then, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Shouty Boss. If it is not possible to set up the Shouty Boss, it is slain.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: If this terrain feature does not have a Shouty Boss , pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Infantry Hero^^** that is not in combat and is within 3" of it  to be the target.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Shouty Boss (see ‘Man da Tower’).
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Add 1 to dirty trick rolls for friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units wholly within 12" of this terrain feature or for enemy units within 12" of this terrain feature. If this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss, add 1 to dirty trick rolls for friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units wholly within 18" of this terrain feature instead of wholly within 12" or for enemy units within 18" of this terrain feature instead of within 12".
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Your Movement Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: If this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Shouty Boss.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick an enemy **^^Infantry^^** unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Rampage^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Any Combat Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text:
Make a breaka-roll of D3.
• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on this unit equal to the breaka-roll.
• Double the breaka-roll and add that value to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Mirebrute’s Clubs** for the rest of the turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Start of Any Turn
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: **Heal (D3)** this unit.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Companion
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: This unit’s **Klutcha-grot** is a token. If it is removed from the battlefield, this unit cannot use the ‘A Tough Grot to Swallow’ ability.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Any Combat Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick an enemy **^^Monster^^** in combat with this unit to be the target.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is damaged. On a 3+, the target has **^^Strike-last^^** for the rest of the turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a **^^Rampage^^** ability for an enemy **^^Monster^^** within 6" of this unit
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice. On a 2+, that **^^Rampage^^** ability has no effect. On a 1, remove this unit’s **Klutcha-grot** from the battlefield.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Anti-**^^Monster^^** (+1 Rend), Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by champions in this unit.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Anti-**^^Monster^^** (+1 Rend), Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: While this unit contains any musicians, if it uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make one additional rally roll of D6.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Anti-**^^Monster^^** (+1 Rend), Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Sludgeraker’s Talons** is 4.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick up to 3 enemy units that had any damage points allocated to them this turn by attacks made by this unit or a friendly unit with the **^^Sludgeraker Venom^^** keyword to be the targets.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:
• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the end of the next turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: **^^Rampage^^**
characteristics.name: Keywords

characteristics.$text: Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: That unit has the **^^Sludgeraker Venom^^** keyword for the rest of the turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Companion
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Companion
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units have **^^Ward (6+)^^** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Any Combat Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice for each target. On a 1, this ability has no effect. On a 2-5, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. On a 6, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text:
If this **^^Hero^^** is within the combat range of a friendly unit that is not a **^^Hero^^**:
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this Hero.
• If this **^^Hero^^** is **^^Infantry^^**, they cannot be picked as the target of shooting attacks made by models more than 12" from them.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Any Combat Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by non-**^^Hero^^** units that target this unit for the rest of the turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by champions in this unit.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: While this unit contains any musicians, if it uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make one additional rally roll of D6.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: While this unit contains any standard bearers, add 1 to this unit’s control score.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: For the rest of the turn, the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Beast-skewer Bolts** is 6 if the target is a **^^Monster^^**.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Your Shooting Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: If this unit has not used a **^^Move^^** ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: D6
characteristics.name: Dmg

characteristics.$text: Anti-**^^Monster^^** (+1 Rend), Crit (Auto-wound)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: Crit (Mortal)
characteristics.name: Ability

characteristics.$text: This unit’s **Pot-grot** is a token. Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit while its **Pot-grot** is on the battlefield. If you make an unmodified casting roll of 4 or less for this unit, remove its **Pot-grot** from the battlefield.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
characteristics.name: Timing

characteristics.$text: Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Infantry^^** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
characteristics.name: Declare

characteristics.$text: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn. On a 1, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.
characteristics.name: Effect

characteristics.$text:
If this **^^Hero^^** is within the combat range of a friendly unit that is not a **^^Hero^^**:
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this Hero.
• If this **^^Hero^^** is **^^Infantry^^**, they cannot be picked as the target of shooting attacks made by models more than 12" from them.
characteristics.name: Effect
